channel.title: Help With Java Error! (happens on knightscape client)
channel.description:
yes, i know this site is about Moparscape and all that but, this error can happen with any client (moparscape too) and the error goes: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client and i have doen what the tut said on the Knightscape site...didnt help...so if someone could help me (or possibly make a tut) THAT WOULD BE AWESOME! :) :)
~TY Kami
P.S.- on my dads jeep coupon thingy..one of the sponser things said "Mopar" with the same logo as here...well anyway..HELP PLZ :eek: :eek:

item.title: Help With Java Error! (happens on knightscape client)
item.dc:creator: @kamigawa10 kamigawa10
item.description:
@kamigawa10 wrote:

i tryed that…didnt work, now what…i know i need to change something but a some help or a guide would be great right about now
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 24, 2006, 10:12:30 AM[/size][hr]come on, SOMEONES gotta know how to solve this!

item.source: Help With Java Error! (happens on knightscape client)

item.title: Help With Java Error! (happens on knightscape client)
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client

Means that it can’t find client.class in your folder.

Read full topic
